description: Try our easy to follow Summer Rice Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice salad,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Rice,Egg free,Tomato,Dairy free
name: Summer Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the brown rice and wild rice in separate saucepans according to packet instructions. Drain. Cool completely.
Blanch snow peas and green beans. Drain. Plunge into iced water. Drain well.
Toss brown rice and wild rice together in a large bowl. Stir in peas, beans, tomato, capsicum, herbs and nuts.
Whisk together the oil and lemon juice. Pour over the salad and gently fold through to combine.

Baby: To make as a mash, omit wild rice, capsicum, mint and nuts and reduce oil to 2 tbs. Blend green veg, brown rice, tomato, parsley and 1/4 cup grated tasty cheese. Stir in 1/4 cup boiled cooled water. Makes 12 baby serves.
Toddler: Omit ingredients as for baby version. Mix green veg, brown rice, tomato, parsley and 2 tbs oil in a large bowl. Makes 8 toddler serves.
